forEach.log: Total Number of Jobs Printed for Category:{@!category!@}-{@!catJobs!@}

field.name: JobEducation
field.regex: Minimal education required for this job(.*?)(.*?)

field.name: button
field.regex: Click here to go to next page of the search" value="(.*?)" class="btnRight"

if.log: Bad location for Job ID: {@!data.id!@}, city-state: {@!data.locationDetail!@}
Job with job ID: {@!data.id!@} [{@!cat.name!@},{@!data.locationDetail!@}] not available.

field.name: unavailableJob
field.regex: Job Opening # (.*?) is no longer available

field.name: Location
field.regex: (?s).*?Location:.*?.*?(.*?)

field.name: Category
field.regex: (?s).*?Category:.*?.*?(.*?)

field.name: ApplyURL
field.regex: Your application choices are:<ul><span id="Online"><li>Apply for this job <a href="(.*?)" class="iCIMS_Anchor">online

field.name: ApplyEmail
field.regex: resume as an attachment via <a href="(.*?)" class="iCIMS_Anchor">e-mail

field.name: JobDescription
field.regex: (?s)More information about this job:.*?iCIMS_InfoField_Job">(.*?)<td class="iCIMS_InfoField iCIMS_InfoField_Job"><b>Qualifications

match.regex:
Showing Records: (\d+) - (\d+)
Total Records: (\d+)

field.name: JobId
field.regex: (.*?)

field.name: JobTitle
field.regex: (.*?)

field.name: JobCity
field.regex: (.*?)

field.name: JobState
field.regex: (.*?)

field.name: JobDescription
field.regex: (.*?)

field.name: JobRequirements
field.regex: (.*?)

parser.name: JobCountryLinkCategoryParser
parser.regex: (?s)([^"]*)\s*([^"]*)\s*

field.name: JobId
field.regex: Auto req ID(.*?)
